ygData.subject: Re: New Bard...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found that I dodge much better, usually 3-5 times in a fight with a zombie when i am at my equipment only weight of 45.  When carrying loot and up
ygData.messageBody:
I have found that I dodge much better, usually 3-5 times in a fight with a
zombie when i am at my equipment only weight of 45. When carrying loot and
up around 65 i am lucky to dodge 1 time in a fight with zombie that /cons
the same. I think the affect of encumbrance, maybe as a percentage of total
allowed, on dodge and running speed.

Kitasi
The mournful bard of Faydwer on E'ci
"and no one shall work for money,
and no one shall work for fame"
"but each for the joy of the working,
and each to his seperate star..."
